comment._content: Pauline Frederick (August 12, 1883, Boston - September 19, 1938, Beverly Hills, California) was an actress best known for her Hollywood films. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pauline_Frederick

comment.author: 94058635@N04
comment._content: Great American actress, 1883 - 1938, who starred on both stage and screen.  Born Beatrice Pauline Libby in Massachusetts.  She made films from 1915 to 1937.
